name: LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 Project
summary: Learn about .EV3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 allows you to develop and control LEGO robots. When programming a robot, you can save your progress as a project, which you can re-open later. To save a project as an EV3 file, click the “+” tab at the top left of the Lobby screen in the application and click the floppy disk “Save” icon at the top right.

instructions: You can open EV3 files with the Home and Education versions of LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 in Windows or macOS. For example, to open an EV3 file:
Navigate to the Lobby screen in the application.
Select Open Recent → Open Project… in the top-right corner.
Navigate to the EV3 file, select it, and click Open.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
